name: After the Charmony Fall
descHash:
The eternal dream he longed for vanished in an instant. As he plummeted towards the earth, he felt no sadness, only a desire to close his eyes.

The old path treaded upon has now crumbled, yet the journey ahead remains shrouded in mist.
"After the awakening, the world continues its cycle of suffering, with no escape, the same as always..."
He carries the past, turns his back on his homeland, and continues towards a paradise that does not yet exist.

So, why do people slumber? And why do they wake?
— As planets streak past outside the window, this answer now demands a new meaning to be given.
"Maybe... just maybe I still can..."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

549210.name: Tatters of Thought
549210.desc: A memoria fragment of fleeting thought. Crude material used for enhancement.
549210.lore:
Within the Memory Zone, thousands of thoughts flutter like dust. Broken thoughts accumulate, serving as nourishment and components for memes.

"A fleeting thought may dissipate into thin air or amass into obsessions."
comeFrom: Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

589816.name: Dynamic Outlining
589816.desc: A Clockie outline drawing, where the silhouette of the dream was already leaping out of the page. Used to level up Traces moderately for Erudition characters.
589816.lore:
The Clockie drawing looks more refined after the unnecessary strokes are removed. The animators hid their wisdom in every frame of Clockie's dance and can be clearly discerned.

"Tick-tock, tick-tock! Keep up, my friend!"

633151.name: Fragments of Impression
633151.desc: A memoria fragment of profound impression. Normal material used for enhancement.
633151.lore:
Within the Memory Zone, the form of memories float as fleeting glimmers of light, and only profound and memorable fragments can condense it crystals.

"Memory is not a mere replication of past sensations, but a reconstruction of past impressions."
comeFrom: Memory Zone Meme at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

673757.name: Exquisite Colored Draft
673757.desc: A colored draft of Clockie that brings the dream to life with vibrant colors. Used to level up Traces significantly for Erudition characters.
673757.lore:
Clockie becomes filled with colors, taking on the shape that will become a household name. Clockie's story inspired millions of Dreamchasers, with every one of them able to be inspired by his fantastical adventures.

"My name is Clockie, and I'm a superstar in Dreamville Penacony!"

694487.name: Refined Aether
694487.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>6000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694487.lore:
A canister of aether that has been extracted and distilled using special procedures.

"The Garden looks forward to recreating a past glory, but it is a 'past glory' selected by them. Do you understand?"

694488.name: Condensed Aether
694488.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>2000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694488.lore:
A can of Aether refined through special techniques.

"Handle with care, do not drop or place pressure upon it. If damages and leaks occur, please refer to chapter II of the Leak Disaster Response Manual for emergency response."

694489.name: Sparse Aether
694489.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>500</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694489.lore:
An imaginary substance that shouldn't exist in reality. The basic material to create Light Cones.
The images contained in the Light Cones become clearer when infused with this substance.

"I see, so this is the supposed 'memoria' of the Garden of Recollection. No wonder the Memokeepers can set off on galactic voyages with memories."

717092.name: Shards of Desires
717092.desc: A memoria fragment of obsessive desires. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717092.lore:
Within the Memory Zone, memoria of desires develops ceaselessly. It absorbs thoughts and impressions, nurtures magic mirrors of desires, and reflects the eerie shadows of memetic entities.

"Memory points to the past, while desire points to the future. To seek desires from memory will cause dreams to become inverted, and inner demons will naturally be born."
comeFrom: Memory Zone Meme at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

874343.name: Rough Sketch
874343.desc: The character design draft for Clockie, where a few pen strokes already gave the dream a shape. Used to level up Traces slightly for Erudition characters.
874343.lore:
Various original sketches of Clockie are widely circulated on Penacony. Exactly who captured the fleeting spark of inspiration and rang the first sound of "tick-tock" on the canvas?

"Tick-tock! You... can see me?"

skill.name: Quiescence
skill.descHash: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by #1[i]%. After the wearer uses Ultimate, increases SPD by #2[i]%, lasting for #3[i] turn(s).
